trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a DLL specified in a DLL import cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 当未找到在 DLL 导入中指定的 DLL 时所引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DllNotFoundException> uses the HRESULT COR_E_DLLNOTFOUND, which has the value 0x80131524.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DllNotFoundException> 使用 HRESULT COR_E_DLLNOTFOUND，其值 0x80131524。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.DllNotFoundException>, see the <xref:System.DllNotFoundException.%23ctor%2A> constructors.
trans-unit.target: 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表<xref:System.DllNotFoundException>，请参阅<xref:System.DllNotFoundException.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DllNotFoundException> is thrown when a dynamic link library defined by the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute?displayProperty=nameWithType> attribute or a comparable language construct, such as the Visual Basic `Declare` statement, cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DllNotFoundException>时动态链接库定义的引发<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性或可比较语言构造，如 Visual Basic`Declare`找不到语句。

trans-unit.source: It is not thrown when the common language runtime is unable to load a .NET Framework assembly.
trans-unit.target: 它不会引发时公共语言运行时无法加载.NET Framework 程序集。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute> can specify the path to the directory in which the DLL resides.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute>可以指定 DLL 所驻留的目录的路径。

trans-unit.source: If a path is not specified, Windows uses the search order described in [Dynamic-Link Library Search Order](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=122531).
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定路径，Windows 将使用中所述的搜索顺序[动态链接库搜索顺序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=122531)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DllNotFoundException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.DllNotFoundException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DllNotFoundException" /> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认属性初始化 <see cref="T:System.DllNotFoundException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.DllNotFoundException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.DllNotFoundException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 本地化的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DllNotFoundException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的错误消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.DllNotFoundException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.DllNotFoundException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.DllNotFoundException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关所引发异常的序列化对象数据的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />，它包含关于源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DllNotFoundException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 用序列化数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.DllNotFoundException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>inner</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>inner</c> 参数不为 <see langword="null" />，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 <see langword="catch" /> 块中引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DllNotFoundException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.DllNotFoundException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.DllNotFoundException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.DllNotFoundException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 内部异常引用。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。
